transArray.content: The room was super small, and there were special hairs after the quilt was lifted... But the service was pretty good. They kept my things for me after I left them there.

Dear guest, hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. As a comfortable brand of Huazhu, the Orange brand attaches great importance to the stay experience of all guests. Your happiness during your stay is our unchanging goal. Thank you for your support. In recognition of our service attitude, the hotel area is disinfected and cleaned every day, and the hotel has also strengthened the intelligent "contactless" delivery robot service. There is indeed a certain gap between the hotel room area and the newly opened store. We have recently updated the room Bedding, TV, kettle, mouthwash cup, etc., in order to make your stay more comfortable, we are constantly working hard to immediately conduct self-examination and self-correction on the hygiene issues you reported. We used the morning meeting time today to check all The housekeeping lady has conducted room-making process training and provided one-to-one supervision and guidance. This has brought you a poor check-in experience. I would like to express my sincere apologies. I hope that in future work, we can use our careful work to be able to In exchange for your peace of mind and comfort when you check in, we hope that you can see our changes next time you check in. We will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient check-in experience. All hotel staff look forward to every encounter with you, and wish you all the best in your work! Manager: Zhang Minghui
